name: Gold Rush Cocktail
description: This drink blends bourbon, lemon juice, and honey syrup for a whiskey-laced spin on the Bee's Knees.
recipeIngredient: 3/4 ounce freshly squeezed juice from 1 lemon

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in an ice-filled shaker. Shake until well chilled, about 10 seconds. Strain into an ice-filled double old fashioned glass.
